question: AT WHICH STAGE IS YOUR BUSINESS?

options.name: INSPIRATION
options.tooltip: You are brimming with ideas and trying to figure out the next steps to take.

options.name: PLANNING
options.tooltip: You are researching and gathering resources.

options.name: VALIDATING
options.tooltip: You are in the testing phase and observing market data.

options.name: GROWING
options.tooltip: You are established and interested in expanding.

options.name: ESTABLISHING
options.tooltip: You are working on creating a sustainable long-tem plan.

options.name: EXITING
options.tooltip: You want to sell leave or trade your business.
